messages.message: Hi team,  Document translation: What is the best way to translate Docs from French to English with AI Hub? I tried to use our Doc-Translation_Dup but I keep having failed runs. (best formats, best apps etc)

Hi @Lucile, can you link the Doc Translation app that you're using? The prod Doc Translation app is here (https://aihub.instabase.com/hub/apps/706f745c-d556-4424-905f-b03112462430/Doc-Translation). I'm not sure what Doc-Translation_Dup is. If possible, please share the doc that you're trying to translate as well. Thanks!

Hey @jayapandian.ponraj thanks for looking into it :slightly_smiling_face: I didn't use the correct the app. I do have some layout issues as you can see in the print screen here. Do you have any recommendations to fix this?

The Doc Translation app tries to preserve layout and styling as much as possible. But it does not get it 100% right all the time. Unfortunately there is no easy fix for the above document as there are no knobs to tweak the results from the app. We'll need to invest more dev efforts in improving the app itself in terms of preserving the layout and styling. :slightly_smiling_face:
